english: be on good/close terms; to get along well
honorific expression for いく、くる、and いろ
honorific expression for たべる、のむ
to call (one's name) (～と); to invite (person を event に)
to move (to another place to live) (～に)

kanji: 持てる（rare、モテル also common）
english: to be popular (in terms of romantic interest) (people に)
to treat/invite (someone) to a meal (person に meal を)
to hold back for the time being; to refrain from
to invite someone (to an event/a place) (person を event に)

kana: よろしくあったえください
kanji: よろしくお伝えください
